channel.title: Knuth on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Knuth on purpleidea.com

item.title: really well written article
item.description: i’m sure that most (if not all) of the technically inclined readers know about this already, but since it’s such a well written article (and detailed in the right places), i felt i should bump up it’s link count. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binary_prefix as an aside, i really liked Knuth’s suggestion; in the meantime let’s use the stupid kibi’s.
